General.Name: Chongqing VDL Electronics Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Chongqing VDL Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures micro lithium battery in consumer electronics industry. The company offers products, such as rechargeable coin battery, rechargeable square pouch battery, and rechargeable cylindrical pouch battery. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Chongqing, China.
